sections.description: Allows you to export all customer emails from WooCommerce into a CSV file.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate the plugin through the plugins menu.
  2. Go to WooCommerce > Reports > Customers tab to use this function.
sections.screenshots: 1. The email export page
sections.changelog:
1.1 – April 11, 2018

  • Some bugs were fixed.
  • Release date.

1.2 – May 1, 2019

  • UTF8 support added
